docs.title: About me
docs.text: My name is Yuhuang Meng, and I am a master student in Shanghaitech University. My instrests mainly focus on the data-driven modelling and machine learning.

docs.title: Education
docs.text:
• B.s., North China Electric Power University, 2017.09 - 2021.06 (GPA: 3.8???/5, No.5/53???)

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
